RKO cells were treated with Wnt3a in the presence or absence of 300 pg/ml mabLRP6 for 24 hours. 
100 μl of plasma obtained from mice after treatment with 9.4 μg mLRP5/6 showed an ˜5-fold and 2-fold greater inhibition of Wnt3a-mediated luciferase activity 48 and 72 hours, respectively, after drug administration compared to IgM injected controls.
